notes: Spacious, modern apartment in excellent condition with recessed lighting, crystal chandeliers, and contemporary finishes. The unit features multiple rooms with AC units, a well-equipped kitchen with modern appliances, and large floor-to-ceiling windows providing good natural light. For baby safety, the balcony railings appear decorative/ornamental style which would need additional safety barriers; the unit is single-level with no internal stairs and has rounded ceiling details rather than sharp corners.
